mapper.select: select c.cart_id as cartId, c.user_email as userId, p.product_seq as productId, m.user_name as userName, p.product_title as productName, c.amount as amount , p.product_price as productPrice, (product_price*amount) money, p.product_img as productImagePath,p.product_size as productSize,po.product_stock as productStock, p.product_color as productColor from tbl_user m,tbl_cart c, tbl_product p,tbl_product_option po where m.user_email = c.user_email and p.product_seq = c.product_seq and c.user_email=#{userId} and c.product_seq=po.product_seq
